articles.author: James Archer
articles.title: Amazon Prime Big Deal Days 2023: dates, PC gaming deals, and everything else you need to know - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: Prime Day 2? Kinda - Amazon Prime Big Deal Days is coming in October, with deals just for Prime members. Here's everything you need to know.
articles.content: Prime Day 2023 only came and went in July, but that hasn’t deterred Amazon – who presumably own a number of oversized clocks with the word "DEALS" replacing all twelve numbers – from announcing anoth… [+5968 chars]
